ygData.subject: Re: Rubies- Where to Find & QUEST
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Jewelry is created using the standard ruby. It is expensive enough that I think if it is found as loot, it will be on pretty high monsters :) The other
ygData.messageBody:
According to Bill Tong:
> Be carefull with Rubies that are LORE items.
> I will assume that you need the RUBY to create
> jewellery. They dont seem to work. I have tried

Jewelry is created using the "standard" ruby. It is expensive enough
that I think if it is found as loot, it will be on pretty high monsters :)

The other rubies are totally different items that just share:
1) a name (part)
2) a picture

Internally, they are as different as a spiderling silk is from a ruby.
